title: Exploring Golang's Range Keyword
description: The range keyword is used to iterate over elements in a variety of data structures in Golang. In this challenge, we will explore how to use range with different data structures.

meta.title: Golang Range Iteration | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Explore the use of the 'range' keyword in Golang to iterate over slices, arrays, maps, and strings. Learn how to leverage this powerful feature in your programming projects.
meta.keywords: Golang, Range Iteration, Slices, Arrays, Maps, Strings, Programming Tutorials

verify.name: Verify Go Program Outputs Correct Sum
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 探索 Go 语言的 range 关键字
i18n.description: 在 Go 语言中，range 关键字用于遍历各种数据结构中的元素。在本挑战中，我们将探索如何在不同的数据结构中使用 range。

meta.title: Go 语言范围迭代 | 编程教程
meta.description: 探索 Go 语言中 'range' 关键字的用法，以遍历切片、数组、映射和字符串。了解如何在你的编程项目中利用这一强大功能。
meta.keywords: Go 语言, 范围迭代, 切片, 数组, 映射, 字符串, 编程教程
